Načítání…: Zmáčkněte Esc. nebo klikněte znovu pro zavření tohoto okna.

Loading…: Hey! You have too much you fraudster, stay away!
Načítání…: Hej! Máš příliš hodně peněz, odpal!
Ładowanie…: Hej, masz za dużo długów, trzymaj się z daleka!

Loading…: You ran too much into debt and were arrested. All of your property was confiscated.
Načítání…: Byli jste příliš zadlužení a byli jste zatčeni. Veškerý vás majetek byl zabaven.

Loading…: Your attempt to escape was discovered. You are now arrested and charged with being a traitor.
Načítání…: Váš pokus o útěk byl zjištěn. Byli jste zatčeni za vlastizradu.

Loading…: The city you were in was captured by a Slovak regiment. There are no more chances for escape.
Načítání…: Obec ve které jste byli byla obsazena. Není již šance na útěk.

Loading…: The authors of this game have no intention to insult any race, nationality, political party or any other group of people. This game was made for entertainment purposes only and does not in any way, shape or form reflect the political views of the authors. We hope that you will enjoy the game.
Načítání…: Tato hra nemá za účel urazit žádnou etnickou skupinu, národ, politickou stranu či jinou skupinu lidí. Tato hra byla stvořena jenom pro pobavení a nereprezentuje názory autorů. Doufáme, že si tuto hru užijete.
Ładowanie…: Autorzy gry nie mają w umysłech uszkodzić jakejkolwiek TODO
asi ne…: Z důvodu nedávných událostí je přidána tato pocta pánovi Jaroslavu Baštovi, politikovi a kandidátovi na prezidenta za stranu SPD. R.I.P.

Loading…: Today, the Army of the Slovak Republic has crossed the border into the republic of Moravistan.
Načítání…: Dnes, Slovenská armáda překročila státní hranici Moravistánu.

Loading…: Zlín has just fallen and the battle for Valašské Meziříčí is well underway.
Načítání…: Zlín právě padl a současně se bojuje za Valašské Meziříči.

Loading…: It is unknown how far into Moravistan will the Slovaks get.
Načítání…: Není zatím známo kam až armáda pronikne.

Loading…: So I guess there is only 1 option left now. Escape to Poland before it is too late.
Načítání…: Tak už zbývá jedna možnost: uteču do Polska než bude pozdě.

Načítání…: Takže náš číšník nás opustil a nemáme nikoho jiného.

Loading…: Perhaps you could step in? Serve a few tables here and there, and get some money in return?
Načítání…: Možná by jsi nám mohl pomoci? Sem tam něco přinést a odnést a dostat za to nějaký peníz?

Loading…: I hope that you’ll change your mind.
Načítání…: Vřele doufám že si to ještě rozmyslíš.

The goal is to catch things out of the river using your fishing rod. The fishing rod moves from side to side automatically. The fishing rod also attaches to the first object it encounters. To activate the fishing rod at the specified angle simply click or tap on the screen. Each activation of the fishing rod costs
For catching a fish you will get
, for catching a shoe you will get
and for catching a tire you will get
You may also pull out a crate. A crate may contain a tire or a shoe, but it also may contain up to

The objective of the minigame is to let as many people through the intersection as possible by managing traffic lights and stopping infractions on rules. For every person who travels through the intersection you will recieve

A traffic jam which streches to the end of the screen will reset the game. Setup of the turning lanes and the bus lanes is done at the beginning according to the arrows. The width of the arrows notes how much traffic will go in each direction. Buses carry between 50 and 100 people.  The game will end once all traffic has been let through or after 5 tries.
Click on the arrows in order to change them. Click on the lane name to change its type. When you are done, click next.

For every incorrectly translated word you will lose

The objective of this minigame is to catch as many fare evaders as possible. Any part of the ticket may be fake. Every passenger will show you their ticket and their ID card. Some passengers will change when the train arrives to the station. For every fave evader caught you will recieve
For every check you will recieve
and for every repeat check you will lose
Before starting the game, you will also see an example of a correct ticket. At least 2 components are fake.

The objective of this minigame is to clean all dirt off the benches. The cleaning towel is bound to your cursor, or if you are on a touchscreen, to your finger. Simply move the cursor back and forth (or swipe) to clean the surfaces. For every cleaned surface you recieve
, if you got more than 80% on your last surface you will recieve

The objective of this minigame is to scan the barcodes on the products. Note that not all of the products have barcodes – in that case, you must find the product code and enter it by clicking on the machine. The scanner will blink when no barcode is found. You will recieve
for each correctly processed product. You will additionally recieve
for each processed customer. A customer may have between 2 and 5 products. The scanner can only scan if the speed is less than 0.2 degrees/second.

Oh, I also sadly don’t have enough change. Sorry.
